subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: At the end of the third round, Phil Mickelson had carved out a one-under-par 69 to share the lead with Kenneth Ferrie of England at the U.S. Open.
snippet: At the end of the third round, Phil Mickelson had carved out a one-under-par 69 to share the lead with Kenneth Ferrie of England at the U.S. Open.
